item.title: Spacing
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: It’s important to leave enough space between trees in the canopy layer, so that there’s enough light coming through to the plants below.

item.title: Tree spacing in the forest garden
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: It’s important to leave enough space between trees in the canopy layer, so that there’s enough light coming through to the plants below.
